definition: in a low voice/(speak) in whispers

sentences.english: I shook my head reprovingly, and then she blushed and whispered.
sentences.chinese: 我不以爲然地搖搖頭，於是她臉紅了，小聲說。

sentences.english: Linda, turn down the record player. I'm trying to read.
sentences.chinese: 琳達，把電唱機關小聲點，我想看書。

sentences.english: Engineering methods for small, movable sources in reverberant fields.
sentences.chinese: 在混響聲場中小聲源和移動聲源的工程測量方法。

sentences.english: I heard it somewhere very quietly.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到有人在非常小聲的說。

sentences.english: I keep asking her to turn down her music.
sentences.chinese: 我一直叫她把音樂關小聲點。

sentences.english: Hermione gave a little moan in his ear.
sentences.chinese: 赫敏在他耳邊小聲呻吟着。

sentences.english: Chu sword achievement the small voice ask Li Ying to fix.
sentences.chinese: 楚劍功小聲的問李穎修。

sentences.english: “I don’t need no milk for lunch, ” he mumbled.
sentences.chinese: “我午餐不需要喝牛奶，”他小聲說。

sentences.english: “This is new, ” whispered our tour guide.
sentences.chinese: 導遊小聲說，這是新加出來的。
“我倦了，比基，”虛弱的她小聲說道。

sentences.english: From the loudness of the tone they heard.
sentences.chinese: 從他們所聽到聲音的大小聲。

sentences.english: Although the He Chen together purple Yi leaves, the crowd of the surroundings murmurs in the small voice.
sentences.chinese: 賀宸同紫怡雖然離開，周圍的人羣卻在小聲嘀咕。

sentences.english: With that, he left the room, muttering under his breath.
sentences.chinese: 說完他就離開會廳，小聲的嘀咕。

sentences.english: She has a happy little giggle.
sentences.chinese: 她會快樂地小小聲咯咯笑。

definition: to talk to oneself/to think aloud/to soliloquize
to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
first tone in Mandarin (high, level tone)
to open one's mouth/to start to talk
